bibl.title: The Lecherous Pseudo-Anubis of Josephus and the "Tomb of 1897" at Achmim.
bibl.note: Decius Mundus and Paulina [Josephus, Antiquities of the Jews 17, 65-80]. - The "Tomb of 1897". - Essays at interpretation [of an erotic scene with Anubis]. - In guise of conclusion.

bibl.title: Et in Aegypto et ad Aegyptum. Recueil d'études dédiées à Jean-Claude Grenier. II

bibl.seg: Klotz David, The Lecherous Pseudo-Anubis of Josephus and the "Tomb of 1897" at Achmim.
Annie Gasse, Frédéric Servajean et Christophe Thiers (Édd.), Et in Aegypto et ad Aegyptum. Recueil d'études dédiées à Jean-Claude Grenier. II = CENiM. 5 (Montpellier, 2012) pp. 383-396, 4 figg. coul.
Decius Mundus and Paulina [Josephus, Antiquities of the Jews 17, 65-80]. - The "Tomb of 1897". - Essays at interpretation [of an erotic scene with Anubis]. - In guise of conclusion.
